entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:35 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3
